card.text: Flying, lifelink

card.name: CW06 — 3 MV
card.text: You may exert 3 MV as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+1 and has flying until end of turn. (An exerted creature won’t untap during your next untap step.)

card.name: CW11 — Positive Aura
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.

card.name: CW12 — Destroy Creature
card.text: Exile target creature with power or toughness 4 or greater. Cycling 2W (2W, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Destroy Creature, you may destroy target tapped creature.

card.name: CW13 — Combat Trick
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it’s attacking, it has first strike until end of turn.

card.name: CU01 — 1 MV
card.text: Threshold —1 MV has +1/+1 and flying as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: CU02 — 2 MV
card.text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: CU03 — 3 MV
card.text: Flash

card.name: CU04 — 3 MV
card.text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, 3 MV gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: CU05 — 4 MV
card.text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on 4 MV.

card.name: CU06 — 5 MV
card.text: Defender Flying Threshold — 5 MV can attack as though it didn’t have defender as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: CU07 — 6 MV
card.text: Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)

card.name: CU08 — Hard Counter
card.text: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. If you’ve discarded a card this turn, you may draw a card.

card.name: CU09 — Soft Counter
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, counter that spell instead.

card.name: CU10 — Lockdown
card.text: Tap target creature and put three stun counters on it. Cycling 1U (1U, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Lockdown, tap target creature and put a stun counter on it.

card.name: CU11 — Card Draw
card.text: Draw two cards, then discard a card. Breakdown — If you’ve discarded a card this turn, draw three cards instead.

card.name: CU12 — Bounce
card.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand. Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: CU13 — Disruption
card.text: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: CB01 — 1 MV
card.text: Threshold — 1 MV gets +2/+2 and lifelink as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: CB02 — 2 MV
card.text: Deathtouch Bloodrush — {B}, Discard 2 MV: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: CB03 — 2 MV
card.text: Bloodrush — {B}, Discard 2 MV: Target attacking creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: CB04 — 3 MV
card.text: Breakdown — You may cast 3 MV as though it had flash as long as you have discarded a card this turn.

card.name: CB05 — 3 MV
card.text: Breakdown — 3 MV has flying as long as you have discarded a card this turn.

card.name: CB07 — 5 MV
card.text: Bloodrush — 2B, Discard 5 MV: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: CB08 — 6+ MV
card.text: Menace

card.name: CB10 — Kill Small
card.text: Destroy target creature if it has mana value 3 or less. Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, destroy that creature instead.

card.name: CB11 — Edict
card.text: Each player sacrifices a creature. Then, return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: CB12 — Return from Grave to Hand
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand instead.

card.name: CB13 — Draw Cards
card.text: Draw two cards, then you lose 2 life. Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, draw three cards and lose 3 life instead.

card.name: CR01 — 1 MV
card.text: As long as another creature you control is tapped, 1 MV gets +1/+1.

card.name: CR02 — 2 MV
card.text: Haste You may exert 2 MV as it attacks. When you do, it gets +2/+1 until end of turn. (An exerted creature won’t untap during your next untap step.)

card.name: CR03 — 2 MV
card.text: Whenever you cycle another card, 2 MV deals 1 damage to each opponent. Cycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: CR04 — 3 MV
card.text: You may exert 3 MV as it attacks. When you do, it gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (An exerted creature won’t untap during your next untap step.)

card.name: CR05 — 4 MV
card.text: Menace Bloodrush — RR, Discard 4 MV: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 and gains menace until end of turn.

card.name: CR06 — 5 MV
card.text: Trample As long as 5 MV is tapped, other tapped creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: CR07 — 5+ MV
card.text: Haste

card.name: CR08 — Efficient Direct Damage
card.text: Efficient Direct Damage deals 2 damage to any target. Cycling 3R (3R, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Efficient Direct Damage, it deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: CR09 — Direct Damage
card.text: Direct Damage deals 1 damage to each of up to two targets. If you control a tapped creature, deal 2 damage to those targets instead.

card.name: CR10 — Steal
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste and “When this creature attacks, exert it.” until end of turn. (That creature won’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.)

card.name: CR11 — Cantrip
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards. If you control a tapped creature, draw three cards instead.

card.name: CR12 — Positive Equip
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has “When this creature attacks, you may exert it. If you do, it gains first strike until end of turn.” (An exerted permanent won’t untap during your next untap step.) Equip {1}

card.name: CR13 — Combat Trick
card.text: Choose one — • Target creature gets +1/+0 and first strike until end of turn. • Target creature gets +1/+0 and double strike until end of turn. Tap and exert it. (An exerted permanent won’t untap during your next untap step.)

card.name: CG01 — 1 MV
card.text: Threshold — 1 MV gets +1/+1 and has deathtouch as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: CG02 — 2 MV
card.text: Mill two cards: 2 MV gains reach until end of turn. Activate this only once per turn.

card.name: CG03 — 2 MV
card.text: Bloodrush — {G}, Discard 2 MV: Target attacking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: CG04 — 3 MV
card.text: You may exert 3 MV as it attacks. When you do, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. (An exerted creature won’t untap during your next untap step.)

card.name: CG05 — 3 MV
card.text: Trample Bloodrush — GG, Discard 3 MV: Target attacking creature gets +4/+2 and has trample until end of turn.

card.name: CG06 — 4 MV
card.text: Vigilance When 4 MV enters the battlefield, you may mill three cards. If you do, you may return a basic land card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: CG07 — 5 MV
card.text: You may exert 5 MV as it attacks. When you do, it gains trample until end of turn. (An exerted creature won’t untap during your next untap step.) 3GG: 5 MV gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: CG10 — Filter
card.text: You may mill three cards. Then return up to one creature card and up to one land card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: CG09 — Fight and Bite
card.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don’t control. Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don’t control, instead.

card.name: CG08 — 6 MV
card.text: Trample

card.name: CG11 — Positive Aura
card.text: Enchant creature While enchanted creature is tapped, it has +1/+0 and trample. While enchanted creature is untapped, it has +0/+1 and reach.

card.name: CG12 — Anti Fly
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target creature with flying. • Destroy target enchantment.

card.name: CG13 — Ramp
card.text: As you cast this spell, you may tap a creature you control. Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. If you tapped a creature, that land enters untapped instead.

card.name: CM03
card.text: When CM03 enters the battlefield, untap target creature or land you control. {2}, Exile CM03 from your hand: Target land gains “{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}” until CM03 is cast from exile. You may cast CM03 for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: CM05
card.text: Menace When CM05 enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. {2}, Exile CM05 from your hand: Target land gains “{T}: Add {B}, {G}, or {U}” until CM05 is cast from exile. You may cast CM05 for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: CM01
card.text: Flying, lifelink {2}, Exile CM01 from your hand: Target land gains “{T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}” until CM01 is cast from exile. You may cast CM01 for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: CM02
card.text: When CM02 enters the battlefield, you may distribute three +1/+1 counters between one, two, or three creatures. {2}, Exile CM02 from your hand: Target land gains “{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}” until CM02 is cast from exile. You may cast CM02 for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: CM04
card.text: When CM04 enters the battlefield, you may discard up to two cards. If you do, draw that many cards. {2}, Exile CM04 from your hand: Target land gains “{T}: Add {U}, {R}, or {W}” until CM04 is cast from exile. You may cast CM04 for as long as it remains exiled.

card.text: When you cycle 5 MV or it enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature. Cycling 2W (2W, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: CU14 — Positive Aura
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying and has “Whenever you discard a card, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.”

card.name: CB09 — Kill Anything
card.text: Destroy target creature. Breakdown — If you have discarded a card this turn, you may cast this spell as though it had flash.

card.name: CW14 — Destroy Artichant
card.text: Destroy up to one target artifact and one target enchantment. Cycling 2W (2W, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Destroy Artichant, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: CB14 — Positive Trick
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains “When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner’s control.” Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: CR14 — No Block
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact • Target creature can’t block this turn. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
